name: quiz_3
description: Simple poll/quiz template with centered title, two side-by-side options in a box, header logo, and footer.

samples.title_text:
WHICH IS MORE
IMPORTANT FOR YOU?

fieldPrompt.title_text: Enter the quiz question or title text (use \n for line breaks).
fieldPrompt.footer_text: Enter the footer text (e.g., social handle).
fieldPrompt.options_box_background: Enter the background color for the options box (hex).
fieldPrompt.options_box_border: Enter the border color for the options box (hex or rgba).
fieldPrompt.divider_color: Enter the divider color between options (hex or rgba).
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: extra HTML inside the poster.

components.html_content:
${title_text}
${option1_label}
${option2_label}
${footer_text}
${custom_html}
